name: Alexander Daum
bio: With over 10 years in the industry, Diego brings a cinematic vision to every project. His background in film production ensures each event is captured with artistic precision.

name: Antonio Chajón
bio: Sofía's meticulous attention to detail and crisis management skills ensure flawless event execution. She coordinates complex logistics with grace under pressure.

name: Alejandro García
bio: Carlos transforms raw footage into compelling stories. His expertise in color grading and sound design brings emotional depth to every production.

name: Ana Flores
bio: Ana combines culinary arts with visual storytelling. Her styling makes every dish irresistible, elevating food photography to an art form.
